duties_responsibilities.duty: Design steel and concrete structures in accordance with ASCE standards and AISC design manuals
Obtain and maintain U.S. Department of Defense Security Clearance
Utilize structural analysis programs such as STAAD.pro
Contribute to engineering and technical services for government clients
Chartered with responsibility for the defense of the country

education_certification.credential: BS Degree in Civil Engineering, Civil/Structural Engineering, or Naval Architecture (Professional Engineering License preferred)
